info.author: Vic Fryzel
info.description:
PySimpleXML simplifies the translation of XML documents into very usable trees
of Python structures (dictionaries, lists, etc), and also simplifies the
translation from those structures back to XML or pretty XML. Specifically, this
library can convert a DOM object, Python struct, XML file, or XML string into
any other item in that list.
info.name: PySimpleXML
info.summary: A simple and practical interface between Python and XML.
info.html_description: PySimpleXML simplifies the translation of XML documents into very usable trees of Python structures (dictionaries, lists, etc), and also simplifies the translation from those structures back to XML or pretty XML. Specifically, this library can convert a DOM object, Python struct, XML file, or XML string into any other item in that list.
